step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your hands clasped comfortably in your lap.
You're raising your hands well. Try to keep your elbows a little closer together as you bring them towards your forehead.
Nicely done spreading your elbows wide behind your head. Remember to keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward.
Good hold! Maintaining an upright posture is key here.
You're returning to the start position effectively. Watch your wrists to ensure they stay aligned.
Second rep starting well. Keep those hands clasped and ready.
Good movement towards the forehead. Focus on keeping the elbows from drifting too far apart.
Excellent job spreading the elbows wide behind your head. Keep that head tall and avoid any forward pull.
Holding steady! Your posture looks good.
Returning to the start smoothly. Pay attention to your wrist alignment as you complete the movement.

exercise_summary: Great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! You're doing well bringing your hands up and spreading your elbows wide. Remember to keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward, especially as you return to the starting position.
